pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:0.5: 91–93. The training rules on having trainee nuns … novice nuns … female householders massage
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.2: the nuns were having trainee nuns …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.1: … female householders massage and rub them.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.2: When people walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.3: “How can the nuns get female householders to massage and rub them? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.4: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.5: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.6: “How can nuns get female householders to massage and rub them?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.7: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.12: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:1.13.1: ‘If a nun has (a trainee nun … a novice nun …) a female householder massage her or rub her, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.6: one who has trained for two years in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.8: a female training in the ten training rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.10: a female who lives in a house is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.11: If she has her massage her:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.12: if she gets her to massage her, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.13: If she has her rub her:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.1.14: if she gets her to rub her, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.2.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:2.2.6: The tenth training rule is finished.
